name: Category Checklist Expander
author: Mark Jaquith

sections.description: This plugin increases the height of the category checklist meta box on the post editing screen so that all categories are shown. No more scrolling! All of your categories will be visible. If you’ve been frustrated by having to scroll to find the correct category, this plugin is for you. No options. Just install it and you’re good.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the category-checklist-expander folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Add a max-height: none rule to fix the plugin in WordPress 3.5

1.0

  • Public release
